sentences.en: a map and compass
sentences.cn: 地图和指南针

sentences.en: According to the map we should turn left.
sentences.cn: 从地图上看，我们应该左拐。

sentences.en: All we had to do was follow the map.
sentences.cn: 我们所要做的就是按照地图走。

sentences.en: He had pinned up a map of Finland.
sentences.cn: 他把一张芬兰地图钉在了墙上。

sentences.en: He spent the next fifteen years mapping the Isle of Anglesey.
sentences.cn: 他在后来的十五年里绘制了安格尔西岛的地图。

sentences.en: He studied his map, trying to memorize the way to Rose's street.
sentences.cn: 他研究了地图，试图记住到罗丝家那条街的路。

sentences.en: He suggested that the shapes represented a map of Britain and Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他暗示这些图形象征了英国和爱尔兰的地图。

sentences.en: I mapped out a route over familiar country near home.
sentences.cn: 我费心计划了一条离家很近的路线，沿途是熟悉的乡村。

sentences.en: I traced the course of the river on the map.
sentences.cn: 我在地图上勾勒出这条河的流向。

sentences.en: I've put a cross on the map to show where the hotel is.
sentences.cn: 我已在地图上打叉标出了旅馆的位置。

sentences.en: just a hick town, right off the map.
sentences.cn: 不过是个乡村小镇，上不了地图。

sentences.en: Many canals were built along map grid lines.
sentences.cn: 很多运河是按照地图上的坐标线开凿的。

sentences.en: She tapped on the world map with her pointer.
sentences.cn: 她用教鞭敲了敲世界地图。

sentences.en: the colour weather map in the newspaper
sentences.cn: 报纸上的彩色天气图

sentences.en: the exhibition put Cubism on the map.
sentences.cn: 这次展览使立体派出了名。

sentences.en: The map is colour-coded and easy to follow.
sentences.cn: 这张地图有色标，很容易看懂。

sentences.en: The map of post-war Europe was redrawn.
sentences.cn: 战后欧洲的版图被重新划定。

sentences.en: The map says there's six of them.
sentences.cn: 地图上显示共有六处。

sentences.en: The map shows the rest of the western region, encompassing nine states.
sentences.cn: 地图上显示了西部地区的其他部分，包括9个州。

sentences.en: The map, on a scale of 1:10,000, shows over 5,000 individual paths.
sentences.cn: 该地图以1：10,000的比例尺显示了5,000多条不同道路。

sentences.en: We drove east to Rostock, where my map led me astray.
sentences.cn: 我们驱车向东去罗斯托克，但地图却给我指错了方向。

words.tran_cn: 可在图上标示的；可用图表示的
映射；制图人；字体映射程序
映射；计划；绘制地图；确定基因在染色体中的位置

phrases.tran_cn: n. 遗传图谱；基因图谱
地质图；工程地质及勘察地质图
在地图上；重要的；出名的
n. 地势图；立体模型地图

trans.tran_cn: 地图，天体图，类似地图的事物，〈美俚〉脸，面孔，（染色体上基因排列的）遗传图
trans.tran_en: a drawing of a particular area, for example a city or country, which shows its main features, such as its roads, rivers, mountains etc
a drawing of a particular area, for example a city or country, which shows its main features, such as its roads, rivers, mountains etc

trans.tran_cn: 映射；计划；绘制地图；确定基因在染色体中的位置
trans.tran_en: to make a map of a particular area

trans.tran_cn: 绘制（一地区等的）地图，勘查，详细规划，[遗传学]比对
